name: Leniko Solutions
description:
Leniko Solutions ,a leading provider of software solutions capable of developing, marketing, and maintaining both web and mobile applications. 
Leniko  has helped 250+ clients develop software solutions and competitive advantages since 2013. Its experienced team of 20+ software developers,designers and marketers and they serves clients at every stage of the software development lifecycle.

The company specializes in the application development of iOS, Android, and hybrid  applications. We provide prompt support and have a deep team of technology experts.
Our Services includes:- 
* IT Services
* Software Development
* Website Development
* Digital Marketing
* Search Engine Optimization
* Legal Services
* Celebrity Landing
How Leniko work -
1. Tell us your requirement/Idea
2. We will setup a short discovery call and get back to you with a ballpark estimate.
3. Detailed proposal will be presented
4. Proposal closure.
Get a free consultation, email us at info@leniko.in
